medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient states that the pain began in the epigastric region and then localized to the right lower quadrant. The symptoms do not have any associated fevers, chills, nausea, vomiting, or anorexia and there were no recent changes in bowel habits.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Removal of adenoids; no history of prior abdominal surgeries.
